value:
You put brigands to work and still got
the gall to call yourselves good guys?
You're worse than the Duma Faithful!

This place is so peaceful...it's borin'
me to tears! I miss runnin' roughshod
over Zofia. Now THAT was fun...

My real name don't matter. I'm a
brigand, and my boys call me "Boss."
Simple as that.

Got any delicate maidens you need
kidnapped? It's kinda my specialty—
Hey, relax, all right? I'm only kiddin'!

From what I hear, I wasn't even
supposed to get summoned to this
place. Send me back already!

Get a load of this palace! I might have
to take a gift back with me. Ya know,
for your pal $Nf.

Steal everything that ain't nailed
down, then go for the nails! That's
how me and my boys do business.

What, I'm supposed to act like some
kinda hero now? Not a chance!
Gah, what a miserable take...

Hu-hu-ho-ho-ha-ha-ha-ha! Now this
is the kinda reward I'm talkin' about!

OK, boys. Steal everything that ain't
nailed down, then—wait, where am I?
"Kingdom of Askr?" Never heard of it!

Hey! It's about time ya sent me back
to Valentia, you think?$k$pHuh? You want me to kick the life of
crime and start livin' on the straight
and narrow here in Askr?$k$pUgh... Well, if it means hot meals and
a roof overhead for me and the boys,
I could be convinced.$k$pEven brigands can have a change of
heart if their basic needs are bein'
met. We ain't monsters...$k$pIs what you wish I'd say, you softy!
Once a brigand, always a brigand, and
me and the boys are doin' just fine!$k$pWe'll take what we want from who
we want, then we'll take some more!
Hu-hu-ho-ho-ha-ha-ha-ha!
You're dead, rat!
Kill 'em, boys!
Hu-hu-ho-ho-ha-ha-ha-ha!
This'll be fun...
Argh! Damn you!
My name? What good'll that do ya, huh?
Hey! Quit pokin' me! You got a death wish or somethin'?
That whelp came bargin' in just as I was gettin' to the main event...
Zofia used to be ripe for the pickin'... It was paradise.
Need some work done? Better be ready to pony up.
There's no shortage of shiny treasure here...or fine women. Heh heh heh...
This partnership is shapin' up real profitable. I think I'm gonna stick around.
What was that?
Hurry up already.
It's rat-killin' time.
